text:
Would'nt it be useful to have an abstract base task from which all tasks derive.
For example all tasks should support "if" and "unless" options. I found this 
necessary in quite a few occasions. Right now there are work arounds but I 
guess it will be useful.
creator: jnaveen@ltp.soft.net

text:
Hmm, most tasks extend a common base class, org.apache.tools.ant.Task.

Those tasks that don't (<condition> for example) do so for a reason, they prefer
to have a different base class or don't want to depend on code inside of Ant
at all.

We've discussed the 'all tasks should support "if" and "unless" options' more than
once on the ant-dev mailing list and it has always been vetoed by commiters.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
